pages.text: $(li)Shears are a sharpness item that can be used to multiple things.
$(li)You can right click in a $(l:patchouli:creatures/vanilla/sheep)Sheep$(/l) while you are holding Shears in your hand to obtain its Wool.
$(li)You can right click in a $(l:patchouli:creatures/environmental/yak)Yak$(/l) while you are holding Shears in your hand to obtain its Yak Hair. It will attack to you after do this.
$(li)You can right click in a $(l:patchouli:creatures/vanilla/mooshroom)Mooshroom$(/l) while you are holding Shears in your hand to transform it into a $(l:patchouli:creatures/vanilla/cow)Cow$(/l).

$(li)You can right click in a $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/pumpkin)Pumpkin$(/l) while you are holding Shears in your hand to turns it into a $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/pumpkin)Carved Pumpkin$(/l).

$(li)You can right click in a $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/autumnity/large_pumpkin)Large Pumpkin$(/l) while you are holding Shears in your hand to turns it into a $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/autumnity/large_pumpkin)Large Carved Pumpkin$(/l).
$(li)You can right click the pumpkin head of a $(l:patchouli:creatures/vanilla/snow_golem)Snow Golem$(/l) while you are holding Shears to reveal its true face.

$(li)You can right click a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/bee_nest)Bee Nest$(/l) or $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/beehive)Beehive$(/l) full of honey to obtain $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/honeycomb)Honeycombs$(/l).
$(li)$(l:patchouli:creatures/vanilla/bee)Bees$(/l) will be aggresive to you after do this.
$(li)You can use Shears to harvest tree leaves too.
